p:
The analysis of total flavonoid content in rhizomata cum radicibus extracts was performed by colorimetric method
35 . Briefly, 30 μL of the extract was added to 150 μL of sodium nitrate (5% W/V) followed by the addition of 3 mL of aluminum chloride hexahydrate (10% W/V) and incubated for 5 min
35 . The 1 mL of NaOH (1.0 M) was added to the mixture and diluted to the mark with distilled water. After incubation at room temperature in dark place for 30 min, the absorbance of the solution was measured at 415 nm by spectrophotometer. For the quantification of TFC, the quercetin (QE) was used as an external standard
35 .
